summary: A fantasy ENB preset made for the community to customize and add their own effects to.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=2]Th[/size][/color][color=#00ff00][size=2]is ENB was created by me and is still in an early stage of development, but I have no idea what to add, so I am releasing it out to everyone to change and build upon. I want people to share their creations with this ENB and expand upon it. Now [b][color=#00ff00][size=2]if you decide to upload your changes on a different page, please remember to credit me and anyone else who was involved in what you've made. If you are adding effects, just upload your effect files only, not the entire ENB preset unless it is necessary[/size][/color][/b]. I myself am currently trying to add effects and will update this ENB as much as possible and optimize it as much as possible. Please feel free to expand upon it. Thank you and enjoy.[/size][/color][/b]

[color=#ff7700][size=3][b][u] -TheDrDocter
[/u][/b][/size][/color][b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/b]
[color=#6d9eeb][center][size=4][b][u]REQUIRED MODS:
[/u][/b][/size][b][u][size=3]
ELFX (no enhancers/exteriors)[/size][/u][/b][/center][/color][b][size=2]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/size][/b]

[color=#e69138]Install/Uninstall[/color]

[color=#e69138]TO INSTALL[/color]

[color=#e69138]1. Download ENB Series [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0262.html]v.261 or above from ENBdev[/url][color=#e69138], (the download button is on the bottom).[/color]

[color=#e69138]2. Extract [/color][b]ONLY the d3d9.dll and the enbhost.exe [/b][color=#e69138]from the [/color][b]wrapper version [/b][color=#e69138]to your Skyrim directory, (by default at C:Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).[/color]

[color=#e69138]3. Place enb Files into the Skyrim directory[/color]

[color=#e69138]4. Add (or modify) these lines to your [/color][b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b][color=#e69138] file (located by default in C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)[/color]
[color=#e69138]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/color]
[color=#e69138]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/color]
[color=#e69138]bDrawLandShadows=1[/color]
[color=#e69138]bShadowsOnGrass=1[/color]

[color=#e69138]5. Open your Skyrim Launcher (NOT SKSE) and diasable ALL Anti-Aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering[/color]

[color=#e69138]6. Set your enblocal.ini file for these two lines- [/color][url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB#tab=Installation]For a tutorial Go here[/url][color=#e69138]:[/color]
[color=#e69138]ReservedMemorySizeMb=xxx[/color]
[color=#e69138]VideoMemorySizeMb=xxxx[/color]

[b][u][size=5]TO UNINSTALL[/size][/u][/b]
[color=#e69138]Delete all files you added from the enb[/color]
[b][b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/b]
[/b][color=#00ffff][b][u]Recommended System Specs:[/u][/b]
GTX650 or amd equivalent
Intel i7 930@2.8Ghz or amd equivalent
4-6GB of RAM
[/color][b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/b]
[b][u][size=4]Recommended Mods(The mods I use)[/size][/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57968/?]Extreme Grass[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49661/?]4K Parallax and Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50065&pUp=1]CM_Bark (in optional files section)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49011/?]Quality Snow 4K[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22608/?]Towns and Villages Enhanced-Windelm[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21148/?]
Towns and Villages Enhanced-Solitude[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?]JK's Whiterun[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57591/?]JK's Windhelm[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48227/?]HD Detailed Terrain[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34886/?]Lorkhan's Vision[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]Skyfalls+Skymills - Animated Distant Waterfalls and WindMills[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48290/?]Skyfix - Unique Inn Signs HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]Wet And Cold[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27022/?]Supreme Storms[/url]
author: TheDrDocter
